title: Dermal Mud Natural Detoxifier Hair Mask - Scalp Exfoliator, Deep Conditioning Treatment Scrub for Dry and Damaged Hair - Non-Toxic, Quick-Dry Formula for Bonding Preparation Skin Care, (8oz)
body_html:
Welcome to the world of healthier hair and scalp with Dermal Mud Scalp Renewal Hair Mask! This special mask is your new best friend for fighting scalp problems like dandruff, dryness, and oiliness. Made in Ireland, our formula is gentle yet effective, drawing out impurities and leaving your scalp feeling rejuvenated in just 10 minutes.

Perfect for anyone who wants to detoxify their scalp without harsh chemicals, our mask is made with safe, water-based ingredients. It’s trusted by hair professionals around the globe for its ability to transform the texture of your hair, making it soft, silky, and manageable.

Easy to apply and quick to dry, Dermal Mud Mask is the ultimate scalp care solution for busy people. Whether you’re prepping for a bonding procedure or just need a quick scalp refresh, our mask has got you covered. With the power of natural clays and botanicals, it exfoliates, cleanses, and soothes, paving the way for healthier hair growth and a balanced scalp.

Choose Dermal Mud Scalp Renewal Hair Mask for a scalp that’s clean, refreshed, and perfectly balanced. It's not just a treatment; it's a transformation for your hair and scalp. Try it today and feel the difference!

  • DEEP SCALP CLEANSE - Dermal Mud Scalp Renewal Hair Mask from Pro Hair Labs, made in Ireland, is your ultimate solution for a healthy scalp. Its unique formula draws out toxins and oils, exfoliates dead skin, and unveils healthy, rejuvenated skin underneath. Perfect for tackling dandruff, dry skin, and oily hair, this quick-drying mask leaves your scalp refreshed and balanced in just 10 minutes.
  • QUICK & EASY FIX - Busy schedule? No problem! Our mask dries fast, making it the perfect quick solution for all scalp types. Simplify your hair care routine with our easy-to-apply scalp detoxifier. In just 10 minutes, Dermal Mud dramatically improves hair softness and texture, unclogs pores to prevent infections and build-up, and ensures a refreshed, healthy scalp after each treatment.
  • SAFE FOR EVERYONE - Crafted with care, our Dermal Mud Mask contains no latex, harmful chemicals, or toxic ingredients, ensuring a 100% safe and gentle treatment for your scalp and hair. Its water-based formulation is recommended by leading hair extension professionals worldwide, making it the go-to deep conditioning treatment for all hair types.
  • PREPARES FOR BONDING PERFECTION - Prepare your scalp like a pro with our purifying mud mask, designed to extract residual oils and provide the perfect canvas for cosmetic bonding procedures. Achieve professional salon results at home, transforming your hair's texture to soft, silky, and manageable with every use.
  • NATURAL INGREDIENTS - Enriched with mineral-rich clays and active botanicals, Dermal Mud not only cleanses and exfoliates but also soothes and revitalizes the scalp. This formula is ideal for dry, oily, itchy conditions and as a pre-treatment for bonding, supporting hair growth and leaving your hair looking and feeling its best.
